Title: Jewelpet Sunshine
Description: ['In Sunshine Academy, there is a class of lost causes known as "the leftovers", the Plum class. Ruby and Kanon Mizushirou navigate through high school life in a fantastical world while juggling their warped friendship with their crush on Mikage Shiraishi.']
Voices: ['Saitou, Ayaka', 'Sasaki, Nozomi', 'Sawashiro, Miyuki', 'Hirano, Aya', 'Matsuzaki, Rei', 'Shimizu, Ai', 'Toyosaki, Aki', 'Kaida, Yuki', 'Erika', 'Sawashiro, Miyuki']
Staff: [['Iwanami, Yoshikazu', 'Sound Director'], ['Moriwaki, Makoto', 'Episode Director, Storyboard'], ['Ookubo, Masao', 'Episode Director, Storyboard, Key Animation'], ['Ogiwara, Rokou', 'Episode Director']]
